title: Message Queues Platform - Project Dashboard
description: Live monitoring dashboard for the New Relic Message Queues platform development
instructions: 2. Go to New Relic One dashboards

queries.title: Active Message Queue Entities
queries.nrql: FROM MESSAGE_QUEUE_CLUSTER_SAMPLE, MESSAGE_QUEUE_BROKER_SAMPLE, MESSAGE_QUEUE_TOPIC_SAMPLE SELECT count(*) WHERE provider = 'kafka' SINCE 1 hour ago

queries.title: Cluster Health Score
queries.nrql: FROM MESSAGE_QUEUE_CLUSTER_SAMPLE SELECT average(cluster.health.score) WHERE provider = 'kafka' SINCE 1 hour ago TIMESERIES

queries.title: Topic Throughput
queries.nrql: FROM MESSAGE_QUEUE_TOPIC_SAMPLE SELECT sum(topic.throughput.in), sum(topic.throughput.out) WHERE provider = 'kafka' SINCE 1 hour ago TIMESERIES

queries.title: Broker Performance
queries.nrql: FROM MESSAGE_QUEUE_BROKER_SAMPLE SELECT average(broker.cpu.usage), average(broker.memory.usage) FACET hostname WHERE clusterName LIKE 'kafka%' SINCE 1 hour ago
